q: AFP)- The United States said it accepted Friday the credentials of the new ambassador named by Alassane Ouattara , the internationally-recognized winner of November 28 elections in the Ivory Coast. Deputy US Secretary of State James Steinberg accepted the credentials today of the new ambassador-designate of the#IvoryCoast, nominated by President#Alassane Ouattara, State Department spokesman Philip Crowley said on Twitter.
